description: Kylian Mbappe is open to one-year Chelsea deal, Manchester United rival Liverpool for Romeo Lavia, Barcelona want Joao Cancelo, plus more.
title: Thursday's gossip: Mbappe, Lavia, Hojlund, Cancelo, Kane, Van de Ven, Caicedo, Hojbjerg
title_page: Thursday's gossip: Mbappe, Lavia, Hojlund, Cancelo, Kane, Van de Ven, Caicedo, Hojbjerg - BBC Sport
maintext:
Paris St-Germain's France striker Kylian Mbappe, 24, has told Chelsea he would be open to joining on a one-year deal if he can move to Real Madrid on a free transfer next summer. (Sport - in Spanish), external
Manchester United want Southampton's 19-year-old Belgium midfielder Romeo Lavia after Liverpool had a bid rejected. (Independent), external
Manchester United's signing of Atalanta's 20-year-old Denmark striker Rasmus Hojlund could be delayed until this weekend after he arrived in Manchester later than planned on Tuesday. (Manchester Evening News), external
England striker Harry Kane, 30, could give up a large part of his Tottenham salary to help push through a move to Bayern Munich. (Bild - in German), external
Tottenham have agreed personal terms with Wolfsburg's 22-year-old Dutch defender Micky van de Ven. (Talksport), external
Tottenham are looking to finalise the sale of 27-year-old Denmark midfielder Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg to Atletico Madrid, who value him at £30m. (90min), external
Inter Milan are interested in Arsenal's 24-year-old Japan defender Takehiro Tomiyasu. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian), external
Barcelona are in talks with Manchester City over a move for 29-year-old Portugal defender Joao Cancelo. (Talksport), external
Manchester United have opened talks with Real Sociedad over the sale of 26-year-old Netherlands midfielder Donny van de Beek, which would help fund a move for Fiorentina's 26-year-old Morocco midfielder Sofyan Amrabat. (Mail), external
Chelsea face competition for Brighton's 21-year-old Ecuador midfielder Moises Caicedo. An unidentified club has made a bid higher than Chelsea's £80m. (Athletic - subscription), external
Chelsea will make an improved offer for Caicedo, who is valued at close to £100m by Brighton. (Sky Sports), external
Aston Villa want Leeds United's 24-year-old USA midfielder Tyler Adams and are willing to meet his £25m release clause. (Mail), external
West Ham are looking at alternatives to Southampton's England midfielder James Ward-Prowse, 28, after having a £30m bid turned down. (Sky Sports), external
Al-Nassr will pay 15m euros (£13m) for Barcelona's 28-year-old France defender Clement Lenglet, who is also wanted by Tottenham.(Sport - in Spanish), external
Luton have agreed a fee of £2.5m plus add-ons to sign Blackburn's 30-year-old Belgian goalkeeper Thomas Kaminski. (Athletic - subscription), external
Inter Milan will raise their bid for West Ham's 24-year-old Italy striker Gianluca Scamacca to £21.5m. (Evening Standard), external
Brazil winger Willian, 34, has received an offer from Saudi Arabian club Al-Shabab two weeks after agreeing a one-year contract with Fulham. (Athletic - subscription), external
Bournemouth are in advanced talks and are set to pip Wolves to the £25m signing of Bristol City's English midfielder Alex Scott. (Telegraph - subscription), external
Everton are looking at Southampton's Ghana forward Kamaldeen Sulemana, 21, as an alternative to Leeds United's 19-year-old Italy winger Wilfried Gnonto. (Football Insider), external
Besiktas are close to signing Arsenal's 28-year-old Ivory Coast winger Nicolas Pepe. (Transfermarkt - in Turkish), external
Nottingham Forest and West Ham are interested in Paris-St Germain's 21-year-old French forward Hugo Ekitike. (RMC Sport - in French), external
Galatasaray are still interested in signing Manchester United's 30-year-old Brazil midfielder Fred this summer. (Mail) , external
